thread.title: The Best Answers From Russell Westbrook's Reddit AMA
thread.title_full: The Best Answers From Russell Westbrook's Reddit AMA | Complex

author: Angel Diaz
title: The Best Answers From Russell Westbrook's Reddit AMA
text:
The NBA season is upon us. To gear us up, Russell Westbrook took part in a Reddit AMA today and as you could imagine the questions and answers were interesting, hilarious, etc. The Oklahoma City Thunder are headed into the franchise's most important season. With Scott Brooks out and Billy Donovan in, they hope to contend in the stacked Western Conference. Also, Kevin Durant is finally back to help Westbrook follow-up his MVP-level 2015 season. Fans asked him about the coaching change, Russ' fashion sense, his favorite meal, his favorite player, Taylor Swift , and a bunch of other things including the person he would most like to dunk on.
We grabbed our favorite answers, check them out below.
